remarks: Distribution of multiplication over subtraction.  Theorem I.5 of [Apostol] p. 18.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
mulm1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subdid.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subdird $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) x. C ) = ( ( A x. C ) - ( B x. C ) ) ) $.
